alert.note: Alert for Chuska Mountains and Defiance Plateau (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 30 at 2:12PM MST until January 01 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM FRIDAY TO 11 AM MST SATURDAY ABOVE 6000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 6000 feet. Snow showers develop Friday morning and continue into Saturday morning, with the heaviest precipitation falling Friday evening into early Saturday. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 6 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Areas above 6000 feet near Buffalo Pass, Ganado and Window Rock. * WHEN...From 5 AM Friday to 11 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening commute, as well as any New Year`s Eve travel. Snow forecast from 5 AM Friday to 11 AM Saturday: Buffalo Pass 4 to 8 inches Ganado 3 to 5 inches Window Rock 3 to 5 inches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
